trans-unit.source: A mutable collection of objects derived from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos mutável derivado o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This class is designed to be used for multi-valued properties that contain Principals.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe foi concebida para ser utilizado para propriedades com múltiplos valores que contêm principais.

trans-unit.source: Manipulating the contents of this collection changes the contents of the corresponding store property, which is made permanent when <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Save*> is called on the corresponding principal object.
trans-unit.target: Manipular os conteúdos desta coleção altera o conteúdo de arquivo de propriedade correspondente, que é efetuada permanente de quando <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Save*>denomina-se no objeto principal correspondente.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal.Save*>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"></xref> object to the end of the collection
trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"> </xref> objeto até ao fim da coleção

trans-unit.source: This function can throw the following exceptions: |Exception|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>|`computer` already exists in the collection.|
trans-unit.target: Esta função pode acionar as seguintes exceções: | Exceção | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>| `computer` já existe na coleção. |</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"></xref> object.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"></xref> object.

trans-unit.target: Esta função pode acionar as seguintes exceções: | Exceção | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>| `principal` já existe na coleção. |</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal"></xref> object to the end of the collection
trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal"> </xref> objeto até ao fim da coleção

trans-unit.source: This function can throw the following exceptions: |Exception|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>|`user` already exists in the collection.|
trans-unit.target: Esta função pode acionar as seguintes exceções: | Exceção | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>| `user` já existe na coleção. |</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal"></xref> object
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal"></xref> object

trans-unit.source: Searches for a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that matches the parameters, and adds it to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Procura um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objeto que corresponde aos parâmetros e adiciona-o para o fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: This function can throw the following exceptions: |Exception|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>|The principal matching these parameters already exists in the collection.| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException>|No principal matching the specified parameters was found.| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException>|More than one principal matches the specified parameters.| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ArgumentException>|Thrown when `identityType` is an empty string|
trans-unit.target: Esta função pode acionar as seguintes exceções: | Exceção | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>| O principal correspondente estes parâmetros já existe na coleção. | | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException>| Não existe nenhum principal correspondentes aos parâmetros do especificada foi encontrada. | | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException>| Os parâmetros especificados corresponde a mais do que um principal. | | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ArgumentException>| Emitida quando `identityType` é uma cadeia vazia |</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ArgumentException> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object for the principal to be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref> objeto para o principal ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref> object that specifies the format of `identityValue`
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"> </xref> objeto que especifica o formato do`identityValue`

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the principal, in the format specified by `identityType`
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que identifica o principal, no formato especificado por`identityType`

trans-unit.source: Removes all Principals from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os objetos principais da coleção.

trans-unit.source: This function can throw the following exceptions: |Exception|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.InvalidOperation>|If this method is called on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members> PrincipalCollection, the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members> property cannot be cleared because one or more of the group's members have this group as their primary group|
trans-unit.target: Esta função pode acionar as seguintes exceções: | Exceção | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.InvalidOperation>| Se este método é denominado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members>PrincipalCollection, o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members>propriedade não pode ser limpo porque um ou mais dos membros do grupo tem este grupo como respetivo grupo primário |</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members> </xref:System.InvalidOperation>

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the collection contains the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve VERDADEIRO se a coleção contiver especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the object matching the indentityType/idendityValue pair is in the collection
trans-unit.target: Devolve VERDADEIRO se o correspondentes do objeto a indentityType / idendityValue par se encontra na coleção

trans-unit.source: This function can throw the following exceptions: |Exception|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException>|There are multiple principals matching these parameters.| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ArgumentException>|The `identityType` parameter cannot be empty.|
trans-unit.target: Esta função pode acionar as seguintes exceções: | Exceção | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException>| Existem vários princípios estes parâmetros de correspondência. | | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ArgumentException>| O `identityType` parâmetro não pode estar vazio. |</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ArgumentException> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object of the principal.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref> objeto do principal.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref> object that specifies the format of `identityValue`
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"> </xref> objeto que especifica o formato do`identityValue`

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the principal, in the format specified by `identityType`
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que identifica o principal, no formato especificado por`identityType`

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> objects from this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref> into the specified array, starting at the specified position index in array.
trans-unit.target: Copia o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objetos deste <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"> </xref> na matriz especificada, que começa no índice a posição especificada na matriz.

trans-unit.source: `array` must be one-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: `array`tem de ser unidimensional.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não, é um <xref:System.ArgumentException>é emitida.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: Further exceptions are thrown if the number of elements to copy is greater than the available space from `index` to the end of `array`, if `array` is `null`, or if `index` is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Outras exceções forem emitidas se o número de elementos para copiar é maior do que o espaço disponível desde `index` ao fim do `array`, se `array` é `null`, ou se `index` é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> that should be populated with <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>que deverão ser preenchidos com <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The position in `array` into which the first principal object in the collection should be copied.
trans-unit.target: A posição na `array` para que o objeto principal primeiro na coleção deve ser copiado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the count of Principal objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a contagem de Principal de objetos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator to iterate through the principals in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um enumerador para iterar através de principais no <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Conceptually, each instance of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection> has a single enumerator associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Concecionais, cada instância de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection>um enumerador único associado ao mesmo.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection>

trans-unit.source: Although multiple calls to <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> return distinct <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> objects, they share the same internal state.
trans-unit.target: Embora várias chamadas para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>devolver distintos <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objetos, partilham o mesmo estado interno.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> containing the principals in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>que contém os principais no <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Returns false.
trans-unit.target: Devolve false.

trans-unit.source: This is not a read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: Não se trata de uma coleção só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns false.
trans-unit.target: Devolve false.

trans-unit.source: It is up to the application to serialize access to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Trata-se até a aplicação para serializar o acesso a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"></xref> object from the collection, and returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"></xref> was a member of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise (in which case the method performs no operation).
trans-unit.target: Remove o especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"> </xref> objeto da coleção e devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"> </xref> era um membro deste <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"> </xref>, e <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> caso contrário (caso em que o método não efetua nenhuma operação).

trans-unit.source: This function can throw the following exceptions: |Exception|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.InvalidOperation>|This method was called on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members> collection for a domain group, and the domain principal to be removed is a member of the group by virtue of its `primaryGroupId` attribute.|
trans-unit.target: Esta função pode acionar as seguintes exceções: | Exceção | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.InvalidOperation>| Este método foi chamado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members>recolha para um grupo de domínio e o principal do domínio a remover é um membro do grupo por virtue respetivo `primaryGroupId` atributo. |</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members> </xref:System.InvalidOperation>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal"></xref> object.

trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref> object from the collection, and returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal"></xref> was a member of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise (in which case the method performs no operation).

trans-unit.target: Esta função pode acionar as seguintes exceções: | Exceção | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.InvalidOperation>| Este método foi chamado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members>recolha para um grupo de domínio e o principal do domínio a remover é um membro do grupo por virtue respetivo `primaryGroupId` atributo. |</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members> </xref:System.InvalidOperation>

trans-unit.source: Finds the object specified by the given and identityType/identityValue pair from the collection, and returns if the identified was a member of this , and otherwise (in which case the method performs no operation).
trans-unit.target: Localiza o o objeto especificado pelo determinado e identityType / identityValue par de recolha e devolve se o identificados era um membro deste , e caso contrário (caso em que o método não efetua nenhuma operação).

trans-unit.source: This function can throw the following exceptions: |Exception|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.InvalidOperation>|This method was called on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members> collection for a domain group, and the domain principal to be removed is a member of the group by virtue of its `primaryGroupId` attribute.| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException>|No principal matching the specified parameters was found.| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException>|More than one principal matches the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Esta função pode acionar as seguintes exceções: | Exceção | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.InvalidOperation>| Este método foi chamado na coleção de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members>para um grupo de domínio e o principal do domínio a remover é um membro do grupo por virtue respetivo `primaryGroupId` atributo. | | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException>| Não existe nenhum principal correspondentes aos parâmetros do especificada foi encontrada. | | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException>| Os parâmetros especificados corresponde a mais do que um principal.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MultipleMatchesException> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal.Members> </xref:System.InvalidOperation>

trans-unit.source: In theory, this should never happen, because <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.Add%2A> throws an exception when there is an attempt to add duplicate principals to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Em teoria, isto não deve nunca acontecer, porque <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.Add%2A>emite uma exceção quando houver uma tentativa de adicionar principais duplicados à coleção.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible that another API created the duplicate.| |<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ArgumentException>|Thrown when `identityType` is an empty string.|
trans-unit.target: No entanto, é possível que outra API criado duplicadas. | | <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ArgumentException>| Emitida quando `identityType` é uma cadeia vazia. |</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"></xref> that identifies the format of `identityValue`.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.IdentityType"> </xref> que identifica o formato do `identityValue`.

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a synchronization object that can be used to synchronize access to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um objeto de sincronização que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref> object itself.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"> </xref> objeto próprio.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> objects from this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref> into the specified array, starting at the specified position index in array.
trans-unit.target: Copia o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objetos deste <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"> </xref> na matriz especificada, que começa no índice a posição especificada na matriz.

trans-unit.source: `array` must be one-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: `array`tem de ser unidimensional.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não, é um <xref:System.ArgumentException>é emitida.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: Further exceptions are thrown if the number of elements to copy is greater than the available space from `index` to the end of `array`, if `array` is `null`, or if `index` is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Outras exceções forem emitidas se o número de elementos para copiar é maior do que o espaço disponível desde `index` ao fim do `array`, se `array` é `null`, ou se `index` é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: The T:System.Array that should be populated with <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: T:System.Array que deverão ser preenchidos com <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The position in `array` to which the first <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object should be copied to.
trans-unit.target: A posição na `array` para que o primeiro <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objecto deve ser copiado para.

trans-unit.source: Returns the count of Principal objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a contagem de Principal de objetos nesta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: It is up to the application to synchronize access to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Trata-se até a aplicação para sincronizar o acesso a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a synchronization object that can be used to synchronize access to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um objeto de sincronização que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar o acesso a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref> object itself.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"> </xref> objeto próprio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator to iterate through the principals in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um enumerador para iterar através de principais no <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Conceptually, each instance of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection> has a single enumerator associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Concecionais, cada instância de <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection>um enumerador único associado ao mesmo.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection>

trans-unit.source: Although multiple calls to <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> return distinct <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> objects, they share the same internal state.
trans-unit.target: Embora várias chamadas para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>devolver distintos <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objetos, partilham o mesmo estado interno.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> containing the principals in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>que contém os principais no <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>
